com.rift.coad.lib.security
Class ThreadsPermissionContainer

java.lang.Object
  com.rift.coad.lib.security.ThreadsPermissionContainer

public class ThreadsPermissionContainer
extends java.lang.Object

This object contains all the thread permissions. It is not a singleton as a result only the object designed to have the rights to elevate or manipulate a threads premissions directly can access this object.

Constructor Summary

          Creates a new instance of ThreadsPermissionContainer

putSession

public void putSession(java.lang.Long threadId,
                       ThreadPermissionSession session)
This method placeses the new thread session in the threads list.

Parameters:
threadId - The id of the new thread to plase in the map.
session - The session to add to the list.

getSession

public ThreadPermissionSession getSession(java.lang.Long threadId)
                                   throws SecurityException
This method retrieves the session information from the map. Will return null if the session is not found.

Parameters:
threadId - The id of the thread.
Returns:
The list of permissions.
Throws:
SecurityException

                   throws SecurityException

SecurityException

getSession

public ThreadPermissionSession getSession()
                                   throws SecurityException
This method returns the permission information for the current session identified by the thread making the call.

Returns:
The thread permission session object.
Throws:
SecurityException
